detectors.description:
DeFigemToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#85-99) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] - _value <= balances[msg.sender]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#89)
	- require(bool)(balances[_to] <= balances[_to] + _value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#90)
	- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] - _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#93)
	- balances[_to] = balances[_to] + _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DeFigemToken.sol#94)
